owuhu nam edirisinhage bandula madhushan kumara, wanniaarachchilage don nihal wijesiri, mankotta kankanamalage sarath kumara rupasinha, juwandarage karunasena jayalath, pilwala gunathilakage lesli chandrathilaka, disanayaka appuhamilage athula senarathna, rathuhalambaage dharmasiri battage lalinda rajarathna, ishan sampath ranasinha saha bohothale aarachchige upali aariyadasa yana ayayi.lanka danda nithi sangrahaye 140, 146, 486 383 saha 32 yana waganthi yatathe owunta adhichodana karamin nithipathiwaraya mema naduwa pawara thibuneya.warsha 2000k wu janawari masa 26 da rathri nithi wirodhi ayuthu janarashiyaka samajikayan wi podu aramunak itukara ganima sandaha aayudha sannaddha wi maththegoda niwasa sankirnaye padinchi mariyo glori rukantha gunathilaka saha walmilla aarachchige suramya rathnakumari chandralekha perera yuwalage niwasata balayen athulu wi owunta tharjanaya kara wada hinsa pamunuwana adahasin niwase thibuna rupiyal eklaksha panasdahasak watina ran aabharana, ath oralosu saha rupiyal laksha thispahak wa tina nishan jip rathaya kolla kama withthikaruwanta erehi adhichodanawa we.mema nadu wibhagayedi rukantha gunathilaka saha chandralekha perera sakki demin adhikaranaya hamuwe prakasha kale warsha 2000 janawari masa 26 wanida maththegoda niwasata aayudha sannaddhawa kada wadunu pudgalayan hirihara kala athara thel wathkara konda thanin thana kapa dama niwase thibu rupiyal laksha 1 1/2k watina ran aabharana saha rupiyal laksha 35k watina jip rathaya da kolla ka pala giya bawath siddhiya kahathuduwa polisiyata danwimen pasu parikshana arambau bawathya.

eya sinhala pamanak rajya bhashawa kirime piliwethak kriyawata damimada 1972 shrilanipa pramukha hawul aanduwa buddhagama rajya aagamaka mattamata esawima da demala janaya dewana ganaye purawasiyan bawata piriheliya. 1970 ganan mada aarthika bindawatima wisin nishpanna kala thawath arbudayak madhyaye, 1977 di balaya dinagath je. aar. jayawardhana nayakathwaya dun ejapaya, kamkaru panthiya matha wyasanakari balapamak athi kala “wiwrutha welandapola” piliweth kriyawata damu lokaye palamu aanduwalin ekak bawata path wiya.
